'''Notes'''
Everything work straight after default Ubuntu install. Even though you get message that proprietary ATI drivers are available, I didn't use them as 3D works fine with default one. You have to remember to press Fn-F7 to enable WEBCAM and Fn-F6 to enable Touchpad.
